WHO.title: Plastikaweb
WHO.position: Freelance FrontEnd Developer living in Barcelona.
WHO.description:
For more than 10 years I have been dedicated to web development, lately focused in angular and typescript.
I try to make my work socially responsible and bring the most advanced technologies to people.

skills.angular:
Angular, version 2 and above, implemented with Typescript

Experience with:

  • Angular Material2 and Teradata Covalent
  • ngrx/store // RxJS
  • firebase // angularfire2
  • NGX-Translate
  • NGX-Charts
  • Unit testing
  • Animation System
skills.javascript:
ECMAScript 5.1, ES6 and Typescript

Experience with:

  • native javascript
  • jquery
  • DOM manipulation
  • async javascript
  • functional programming
skills.CSS3:
Standard CSS3

Experience with selectors, transformations, transitions, flexible box or flexbox design.
skills.Responsive Web Development:
Twitter Bootstrap

Experience with media queries, mobile first approach and components configuration.
skills.Sass:
Syntactically Awesome Style Sheets

Using variables, nesting, mixings...

Compass.
skills.HTML5:
HyperText Markup Language

Semantic web standards.

Experience with related APIs (video, audio, drag and drop, canvas, svg).

WORKS.title: Projects
WORKS.intro: Sorted from the most recent to the oldest

CONTACT.title: Contact
CONTACT.intro: Please feel free to contact me for any project or collaboration for developing services.
CONTACT.quote1: At the moment I am especially interested in projects based on angular (version >= 2) and typescript.
CONTACT.quote2: Likewise, all projects with a high social and cooperative content have priority.
CONTACT.warning:
I prefer contact by email.
I usually do not answer phone calls while I work, because I need to be focused on the development my clients deserve.
I have very bad memory, and any telephone conversation about work should be complemented with a summary via email. So, why not directly use email?
Hope you understand.
